attributes.action: REDUCE THE NATIONAL SPEED LIMIT TO 55 MPH (88 KMH) TO REDUCE EMISSIONS AND SAVE LIVES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cf climate change is important then a simple way to reduce the fuel burned by motor vehicles is to reduce the maximum speed to 55 mph. This would save 10% of the fuel used; it would reduce the seriousness of and frequency of accidents. It would also ease the flow of traffic on busy motorways
